Html: We've come all this way with the D3 tools (given it's almost complete lack of support) and now we may be at a show stopper!! My team and I can't figure out how to link multiple plots. For example, if we have two chartplotters in the same grid area and we use the zoom or pan feature, then the plots should move/zoom in unison. Has anyone figured this out yet? If we can't do this with the D3 tools, then we'll have to revert back to the WPF extended toolkit. Please help.

Hi,

As far as I know, this is not related to Prism, but to the Dynamic Data Display (D3) controls. Therefore, I believe you might find better support in the D3 forums:

  • Dynamic Display Data Forums on CodePlex

Also, take into account that, while the aforementioned site is used for discussion and issue tracking, the D3 project (along with its documentation and other assets) has been moved to Microsoft Research:

  • Dynamic Data Display on Microsoft Research
